A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
CAUTION MAY CONTAIN SPOILERS...

Last Jedi was a best of Star Wars retrospective masquerading as a new movie. 

Not everyone can or should be Han Solo snarky. Every line should not be cut down with a quip. 

Enough with the awful CG characters.

Enough with "Cantina" scenes full of characters that don't do anything. We need more creatures that actually advance the story. 

It's great to see familiar characters\, but not when they either have nothing to do\, become background fodder\, or look like bad CG.

There were great moments\, but they seemed to be bookended by genuinely awful ones. It was like whiplash. 

A one word description would be disappointing.
